original_title: Elisabeth K端bler-Ross - Dem Tod ins Gesicht sehen
overview: Groundbreaking psychiatrist and author Elisabeth K端bler-Ross dedicated her career to working with the incurably ill. In this intimate documentary filmed near the end of her life, K端bler-Ross relates her life story, from childhood to her final years. Friends, family members and colleagues weigh in with insightful observations and share their memories of this remarkable woman whose innovative concepts helped spawn the field of thanatology.
title: Elisabeth K端bler-Ross: Facing Death
